targets.rawSql:
SELECT b.betid, b.betstamp, 
       b.initialprice AS totalBetPrice, 
       b.cashoutprice,
       r.active_bet_price AS activePrice,
       b.selections, 
       a.eventid || ': ' || COALESCE(me.title, '?') as event,
       a.marketid || ': ' || COALESCE(m.description, '?') as market, 
       bs.selectionid || ': ' || COALESCE(a.description, '?') as selection, 
       --a.timestamp, 
       a.isactive,
       bs.price AS oddPrice,
       a.prevprice, a.currentprice, a.pricediff as delta, a.currentprice - bs.price AS diffPrice
FROM bets AS b
  INNER JOIN
    (
      SELECT  b.betid
              --, EXP(b.logcashoutprice) as target_bet_price
              , EXP(SUM(a.logcurrentprice)) as active_bet_price 
              --, COUNT(bs.selectionid) as total_bet_selections
              --, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.isactive THEN 1 END) AS active_bet_selections
      FROM bets AS b
          INNER JOIN bet_selections AS bs ON b.betid = bs.betid
          LEFT JOIN active_selections AS a ON bs.selectionid = a.selectionid
      GROUP BY b.betid
      HAVING COUNT(bs.selectionid) = COUNT(CASE WHEN a.isactive THEN 1 END)
             AND SUM(a.logcurrentprice) < b.logcashoutprice
    ) AS r ON b.betid = r.betid
  INNER JOIN bet_selections AS bs ON b.betid = bs.betid
  LEFT JOIN active_selections AS a ON bs.selectionid = a.selectionid
  LEFT JOIN event_master_data AS me ON a.eventid = me.eventid
  LEFT JOIN market_data AS m ON a.timestamp = m.timestamp AND a.marketid = m.marketid
ORDER BY b.betid
